entry.title: Superbat love-square of distrust and yearning
entry.summary:
Author: AppleKlamm

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,736Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: What is Clark Kent supposed to do when he loves Batman, but is being pursued by Bruce Wayne, a debauched billionaire working with his archenemy? And what is Batman supposed to do when the pure-hearted reporter he can’t give up on is obsessed with the god-like new hero who can’t be trusted?
